testsuite.name: Tests.FeatureTest
testsuite.system-out: Step-1:Navigating to the Feature DropDown And performing click on it Step-2:Taking all the Features From the Feature DropDown and Storing it in List Step-3:PerForming Validation on the List of Features DropDown with the expected List Step-4:Navigating to Feature DropDown and Clicking on the HotelFeatures Step-5:Taking all the Features From the HotelFeatures Tab and Storing it in List Step-6:Performing Validation on the HotelFeatures List with the expected List Step-7:Navigating to Feature DropDown and Clicking on the FlightFeatures Step-8:Taking all the Features From the FlightFeatures Tab and Storing it in List Step-9:Performing Validation on the FlightFeatures List with the expected List
